projects.title: Quizzo
projects.description: This is a Full-Stack App. A platform where teacher can create their own quizes and teachers and students can play quizes here.

projects.title: DocSeek
projects.description: This is a Full-Stack App. A platform which can connect patients with best doctors from around the world.

projects.description: A chat app, where you can create public rooms and chat with folks on the app.

projects.description: Airbnb Clone app is clone of Airbnb travel website

projects.description: Spotify Profile overview app which will fetch a Spotify user's info, recent activity, favorite tracks, favorite artists, and playlist

projects.title: Crypto Trading
projects.description: This is a crypto trading application that displays various cryptocurrencies that can be bought or sold through simulated transactions.

projects.title: Todo App

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: It shows latest top trending movies which you can add to your wishlist.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: It's a fun real-time tic-tac-toe game. Players can create a room and play with friends using room Id.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: It's a fun Memory game. Players have to match fruits on cards.

projects.title: Simon Says
projects.description: Player will have to remember the pattern of colors glow in game & repeat the same by clicking of colors wheel.
